00022 /**
00023  * @file   IntensityMart.h
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Fri Sep 23 09:46:10 2005
00026  * 
00027  * @brief  Base class for ojbects that will dispense data on 
00028  *         a [feature,chip] level.
00029  */
00030 
00031 #ifndef _INTENSITYMART_H_
00032 #define _INTENSITYMART_H_
00033 
00034 //
00035 #include "chipstream/AptTypes.h"
00036 #include "chipstream/IdxGroup.h"
00037 //
00038 #include "file/CELFileData.h"
00039 #include "portability/affy-base-types.h"
00040 //
00041 #include <cstring>
00042 #include <string>
00043 #include <vector>
00044 //
00045 
00046 /**
00047  *  IntensityMart
00048  * @brief Base class for all objects that will dispense data on a 
00049  *        [feature,chip] level.
00050  */
00051 class IntensityMart {
00052 
00053 public:
00054 
00055     /** 
00056      * @brief Virtual destructor for a virtual class.
00057      */
00058     virtual ~IntensityMart() {}
00059 
00060     /**
00061      * @brief Method to create empty sparseMart with same parameters.
00062      */
00063     virtual IntensityMart* copyMetaDataToEmptyMart() const = 0;
00064 
00065     /** 
00066      * @brief Given the probe index and chip index return the intensity
00067      * data appropriate for that probe in that chip. Depending on the
00068      * object that intensity may have been modified from the original
00069      * found on the chip.
00070      * 
00071      * @param probeIx - Probe Index number.
00072      * @param chipIx - Chip Index number.
00073      * 
00074      * @return double - intensity for that position on array.
00075      */
00076     virtual float getProbeIntensity(probeid_t probeIx, chipid_t chipIx, unsigned int channelIx = 0) const = 0;
00077 
00078     /** 
00079      * @brief Return all of the intensities for given chipIx
00080      * @param chipIx - Chip Index number.
00081      * @return double - vector of all intensities in the IntensityMart for given chipIx.
00082      */
00083     virtual std::vector<float> getCelData(int dataSetIx) = 0;
00084 
00085     /** 
00086      * @brief Method for getting vector of intensities in original order in CEL file.
00087      * @param celIx - index of input CEL file
00088      * @param channelIx - index of CEL channel that desired dataSet is on
00089      * @return vector of intensities in CEL file order
00090      */
00091     virtual std::vector<float> getCelData(chipid_t celIx, 
00092                                           unsigned int channelIx) = 0;
00093 
00094     /** 
00095      * @brief Given a vector of data use it to fill in all of the datapoints
00096      * that are going to be needed.
00097      * 
00098      * @param dataName - Name of the vector of data (usually the cel filename).
00099      * @param data - cel file intensity data. 
00100      */
00101     virtual void setProbeIntensity(const int dataIdx, const std::vector<float> &data) = 0;
00102 
00103     /** 
00104      * @brief Get the names (cel files) for the various data that has been seen.
00105      * @return Reference to all of the filenames.
00106      */
00107     virtual const std::vector<std::string> &getCelFileNames() const = 0;
00108 
00109     /** 
00110      * @brief Get the total number of probes that this mart can supply.
00111      * @return int - total number of probes.
00112      */
00113     virtual size_t getProbeCount() const = 0;
00114 
00115     /** 
00116      * @brief Get the total number of CEL channels that this mart can supply
00117      * @return int - total number of chips.
00118      */
00119     virtual int getCelDataSetCount() const = 0;
00120 
00121     /** 
00122      * @brief Get the total number of CELs/multi-CELs that this mart can supply
00123      * @return int - total number of chips.
00124      */
00125     virtual int getCelFileCount() const = 0;
00126 
00127 
00128     /**
00129      * @brief store a set of data index groupings (e.g. datasets grouped
00130      * by CEL file) 
00131      */
00132     virtual void setChannelMapping(const IdxGroup &idxGroup);
00133 
00134     virtual int getChannelCount() const;
00135 
00136     /** 
00137      * @brief Method for setting boolean to indicate if diskMart should store all given intesities or only the ones specified in m_Order.
00138      * @param flag - boolean indicating desired behavior
00139      */
00140     void setStoreAllCelIntensities(bool flag);
00141 
00142 protected:
00143   
00144     /// Object to store information about how the datasets are
00145     /// grouped, e.g. the "channel" group indicates which datasets
00146     /// belong to the same CEL file.
00147     IdxGroup m_CelChannels;
00148 
00149     /// table to lookup translation of chipIx,cel_channel to dataset index
00150     std::vector<std::vector<unsigned int> > m_ChipChannelToCacheMap;
00151 
00152     /// flag to indicate that all CEL intensities should be stored, not
00153     /// just the ones listed in the ChipLayout object
00154     mutable bool m_StoreAllCelIntensities;
00155 };
00156 
00157 #endif /* _INTENSITYMART_H_ */
